EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setmute setup** ~ Creates the muted role and edits the permission in all channels to hide access for muted users.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: The mute role is designed to hide all channels from the muted users. Once you setup the mute role, you should edit your rules channel to allow muted users from viewing the channel so that when a user is muted, they are forced to read the rules of the server.
ALIASES: Setmute does not have any aliases.
SETUP: The mute role has been setup.
ALREADY_DISABLED: The mute role has already been disabled.
DISABLED: The mute role has been disabled.
